StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: NextGen Consortium: Functional Genomics of Platelet Aggregation Using iPS and Derived Megakaryocytes

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS AT CHICAGOUNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO

Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
Acknowledgment of the GeneSTAR (Genetic Studies of Atherosclerosis Risk) NextGEN data should include relevant dataset(s) listed below.
GeneSTAR dbGaP Acknowledgment Statements:
I. Genetic and Genomic Dataset Acknowledgements
A. GeneSTAR NextGEN RNAseq Data “Funding for the RNAseq data was provided by NHLBI U01 HL107446-01, L. Becker, L. Cheng, Principal Investigators, Johns Hopkins University.”
B. GeneSTAR STAMPEED GWAS Data “Funding for STAMPEED genome wide association data in GeneSTAR was provided by NHLBI RO1 HL087698 L. Becker, Principal Investigator, Johns Hopkins University.”
C. GeneSTAR Exome Chip Data “Funding for exome chip data in GeneSTAR was provided by NHLBI R01HL112064 R.Mathias, Principal Investigator, Johns Hopkins University.”
II. Phenotype Dataset Acknowledgement “ Funding for phenotype data was provided by National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute U01HL072518, L. Becker, Principal Investigator, Johns Hopkins University.”
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of the data must be related to Cardiovascular Disease and related disorders. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Data of all types may be used only for studies of cardiovascular and specific cardiovascular related diseases. Data may not be used for the generation of any for profit commercial venture.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cardiovascular Disease, IRB, NPU, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CVD-IRB-NPU-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cardiovascular Disease and related disorders. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
Data of all types may be used only for studies of cardiovascular and specific cardiovascular related diseases. Data may not be used for the generation of any for profit commercial venture.
